channel.title: 317 Mac & Pc Client! Rep++
channel.description:
At my point of desperation, it really doesn't matter if I have a client with customs or not. I need one to start coding with that is Mac and Pc compatible. Does anyone know of such a client? If so please give me the link. I've been searching for almost 4 months now, and if someone could manage to share this client with me, I will Rep++ once I get 15 rep again.
Thanks,
TheCyberMan

item.title: 317 Mac & Pc Client! Rep++
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

You can easily rewrite the run.bat for macs. The problem for older macs is the client won’t even open! For the newer ones, after you click twice on the screen, it crashes. Probably the best solution would be a client that runs off of a .jar that still allows me to edit the files.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Mac & Pc Client! Rep++
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

What actual compatibility problems are there between the two? Because there shouldn’t be any.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Mac & Pc Client! Rep++
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

Yes, a windows computer would seem like the suitable option…what if I have many friends who are mac users and I want players from a mac server to play mine to keep in touch?

Read full topic
